name: brackets-minimap
title: Minimap
description: The minimap shows a smaller version of your code at the right of the screen.  It can be used to quickly scroll to a certain part of your file. This is a fork of brackets-wdminimap by Brian Adams (https://github.com/websiteduck/brackets-wdminimap)
author: Senko Anton <zorgzerg@gmail.com>
